name: Palm File Library
short_description: Handling files in PalmOS is a nightmare when you want to read/write the files in both RAM and VFS. This library is a abstract layer for handling PDB files in PalmOS and other OS/platform. For more information: http://pflib.wiki.sourceforge.net/
